t: Amazon.com: PAUL SIMON: Greatest Hits, Etc (1977 Columbia) [12" 33 RPM Stereo LP Record]: CDs & Vinyl

s: Eno listener reviewing a Paul Simon album. (I never thought I'd be doing that.) Actually, Simon impressed me on this CD for being occasionally rockier than I though he was capable of. I'm not a big fan of his voice or his lyrical cadence, but there are songs I do like.

t: Amazon.com: paul simon songbook LP: CDs & Vinyl
s: The vinyl record of this first Paul Simon album (1965) hasn't been pressed on vinyl since 1979! Glad to get a new copy after after 40 years. Many of the songs contained on this album were later re-recorded with Art Garfunkel for their 2nd and 3rd albums.
